name: Karma
description:
I am proud to announce that I now have my own line of professionally printed greeting cards! Michele Littlefield Designs is your source for sassy, sweet & sometimes downright brazen cards. My new line of cards features my collage art & I will be adding new cards on a regular basis so stay tuned & tell your friends the great news!
***Coming soon....Calendars, Note Cards, Boxed Note Card Set & more.***
This greeting card is 5x7 & the inside is blank so you can use it for any occasion or holiday. It comes with an envelope & it is in a cello sleeve for extra protection.

All of the cards listed in this shop are available for wholesale & for retailers. Please feel free to contact me for prices & information.  
Be sure to check out my blog for the latest crafty happenings in my world, recipes, giveaways & more.
www.michelelittlefield.blogspot.com

Thank you for your interest. I really appreciate it.
